EmailTemplate.subject: [Registration Confirmed] Free Webcast - Experience the High Speed Wi-Fi Advantage: Jet ConneX Powered by JetWave™
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for registering for Honeywell Aerospace's upcoming webcast. This is to confirm that you have successfully registered for the following webcast. Event: Experience the High Speed Wi-Fi Advantage: Jet ConneX Powered by JetWave™
Date: Tuesday, September 11
Time: 8:00 a.m. PT / 11:00 a.m. ET
Please click on the link below to add this event to your calendar. {{my.Add to Calendar:default=edit me}}
See you soon!
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
